title: Third-Party Software Patching
description: A vulnerability is discovered in a widely used third-party library (e.g., Log4j). An analyst must find all applications using the library and coordinate patching.

tasks.description: Use a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) tool to identify all in-house applications that use the vulnerable library.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst generates a complete list of affected applications.

tasks.description: Prioritize the applications for patching based on whether they are internet-facing and handle sensitive data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a prioritized list of applications to be patched.

tasks.description: Create tickets for the respective development teams to update the library to a non-vulnerable version and redeploy their applications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully coordinates the remediation effort across multiple teams.
